sourcesContent:
import {Avatar,  Card, CardContent, Grid, Typography} from '@material-ui/core'
import { Button} from '@material-ui/core';

import axios from "axios";
import { useEffect, useState } from "react";



const ConvertExcel = () => {
    useEffect(() =>{
        GetAllExcel()
    },[])

    const [allExcel, setAllExcel] = useState({})

    const GetAllExcel =() =>{
            
        axios.post(`http://localhost:5000/api/ConvertAll-Excel`)
            .then(res =>  setAllExcel(res.data))
    }

    return ( 
        <Grid container>
           
            <Grid item>
                <Card  elevation={0.5}>

                    <CardContent  >
    
                    <Grid container direction="row">
                        <Grid item xs={1} md={1} sm={1} >
                            <Avatar onClick={()=>console.log("ssa clicked")}>{allExcel.name[0]}</Avatar>
                        </Grid>
                        
                        <Grid item xs={3} md={3} sm={3}  >
                            <Typography> {allExcel.name}</Typography>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={2} md={1} sm={1}  >
                        <Typography> {allExcel.Arret.length} - {allExcel.Relance.length}</Typography>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={2} md={3} sm={2}  >
                        <Typography> {allExcel.auteur}</Typography>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={2} md={2} sm={2}  >
                        <Typography> {allExcel.date_de_creation}</Typography>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item xs={2} md={2} sm={2} >
                            <Grid spacing={1} container justify="space-around" alignContent="center">
                                <Grid item md={5}>
                                    <Button variant="outlined" color="default">PARPRE</Button>
                                </Grid>
                                <Grid item md={4}>
                                    <Button variant="outlined" color="primary" >POS</Button>
                                </Grid>
                                <Grid item md={3}>
                                        <Button >
                                            <Delete color="secondary"/>
                                        </Button>                           
                                </Grid>
                            </Grid>
                            
                        </Grid>
                    </Grid>

                    </CardContent>

                </Card>
            </Grid>

        </Grid>
     );
}
 
export default ConvertExcel;
